column5: These are fun to tie. Still waiting for my pink and blue fur and flashaboo. I used a product called,Faux synthetic buck tail . It is a bit more trickier to tie as it is slippery . Use gorilla glue to secure the wraps. Eyes are craft diamonds. Just add black nail polish to the small dot to act as pupils and secure with UV resin. Some of the dumbbells already had eyes on them . These are my first try at them.
